channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from multiple RSS sources, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to Know About “Capital Calls” As Multifamily Syndications Get “Squeezed” w/Brian Burke and Mauricio Rauld
item.description: Multifamily syndications are getting squeezed. With short-term financing coming due and mortgage rates at multi-decade highs, syndicators are calling on their original investors to raise more money so they don’t […]

item.title: Biden administration plans $285M in CHIPS Act funding for digital twins
item.description: President Joe Biden’s administration is looking to fund efforts that improve semiconductor manufacturing by using digital twins. Digital twins are virtual models used to test and optimize physical objects and systems. For example, auto manufacturers are looking to use digital twins of their factories to experiment with new manufacturing processes without disrupting production. The Biden […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Weinstein Ruling Poses Quandary: Can #MeToo Coexist With Protections for Defendants?
item.description: Proving sex crimes often requires evidence that is generally excluded to protect the rights of the accused.

item.title: Normal Aging Process: Changes, Memory, Eyesight, Hearing, and More
item.description: Curious if your body’s aging is normal? WebMD discusses healthy and normal signs of aging.

item.title: The “Domino Effect”: How to Build an Entire Portfolio from ONE Property
item.description: The hardest part of real estate investing is, of course, getting started. Once you have your first rental property, it’s much easier to scale your real estate portfolio than you […]

item.title: Quora CEO Adam D’Angelo talks about AI, chatbot platform Poe, and why OpenAI is not a competitor
item.description: Quora CEO Adam D'Angelo talks about the challenges and opportunities in AI today, how to build and support a developer community, and more. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Mississippi Lawmakers Considered Modest Public Defense Reforms. They Rejected All of Them.
item.description: With its refusal to impose oversight or consistent standards in local defense, Mississippi risks falling further behind rest of the U.S., critics say.

item.title: What to Eat as You Age
item.description: Your dietary needs change as you age. WebMD advises what should be on your grocery list.

item.title: 10 Rentals in 5 Years by Buying in Overlooked Short-Term Rental Markets

item.title: Sequoia’s Jess Lee explains how early-stage startups can identify product-market fit
item.description: Lee, a specialist in early-stage investing, explains how Sequioa approaches identifying product-market fit for its startups through three archetypes. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: In This Police Youth Program, a Trail of Sexual Abuse Across the U.S.
item.description: Explorer posts, overseen by the Boy Scouts, are supposed to foster an interest in policing. They have faced nearly 200 allegations of misconduct.

item.title: What's Behind Major Rise in Heart Failure Deaths?
item.description: After falling for over a decade, the death rate climbed for several years and now is about the same as in 1999.

item.title: Jack Dorsey departs Bluesky board
item.description: Bluesky’s most prominent backer has left its board. On Saturday, Jack Dorsey posted on X about grants for open protocols from his philanthropic Start Small initiative. This prompted someone to ask Dorsey if he was still on the Bluesky board, and he responded with a terse “no.” Dorsey did not answer any of the follow-up […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Campus Protests Could Shape the 2024 Elections — And Not Just the Presidency
item.description: With hundreds of arrests and more campus standoffs looming, local law enforcement officials could face consequences at the ballot box.

item.title: Jump-Start Your Exercise With This Mindset Reset
item.description: There are far more powerful motivators than “get abs!” to help you start an exercise routine you’ll stick to.

item.title: They Killed Their Abusive Partners. Now Their Sentences Could Be Reconsidered.
item.description: Oklahoma could re-examine how it punishes people whose crimes came after years of domestic abuse. Other states may follow.

item.title: When Does Old Age Start? It Depends on Who You Ask
item.description: The goalpost for old age has been moving. Until now.
